author: bsunanda
body:
#### PR description:

Add material files which can create Run3 scenarios with tracker materal budget changed by +-5% or +-10%

#### PR validation:

Tested using cfg files within Geometry/TrackerCommonData/test/python

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:

Nothing special
title: Run3-trk05 Add material files which can create Run3 scenarios with tracker materal budget changed by +-5% or +-10%
